title: Caveman Ethos; A Lot of Booties; Generationally Juiced
description:
Rece Davis and Pete Thamel are joined by David Pollack to discuss David’s new high-speed internet, David’s best Georgia-Auburn story, the Bulldogs’ youth and immaturity, what Alabama’s offense will look like if Bryce Young doesn’t play, Jimbo Fisher needing to evolve offensively, baseless speculation about who Fisher should hire as offensive coordinator, if Kansas’ undefeated season ends on Saturday, and TCU’s defense. Then, the guys lookahead to pivotal games this weekend for Notre Dame, Miami and Arkansas.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Rece & Pete are joined by David Pollack to discuss Georgia's youth, Bama's offense without Bryce Young, TCU's defense. Plus, pivotal games for Notre Dame, Miami, Arkansas
